title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\BlueGreenSettings\StandardRolloutPolicy
name: StandardRolloutPolicy
description:
Standard rollout policy is the default policy for blue-green.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.BlueGreenSettings.StandardRolloutPolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.batch_percentage
params.description: Percentage of the blue pool nodes to drain in a batch. The range of this field should be (0.0, 1.0].

params.name: data.batch_node_count
params.description: Number of blue nodes to drain in a batch.

params.name: data.batch_soak_duration
params.description: Soak time after each batch gets drained. Default to zero.
